title: Emacs package: pull + comment integration (Task 8)
description: Implement Task 8 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: pull comments, create TODOs, insert markers/links, maintain metadata.

title: Go tool: comment resolution (Task 5)
description: Implement Task 5 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: resolve Google Doc comments when corresponding org TODOs are marked DONE.

title: Emacs package: core infra + config (Task 6)
description: Implement Task 6 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: gh/org-docs.el core infra, config, process IPC, metadata section management.
notes: Added gh-org-docs.el Emacs package foundation: minor mode + keybindings, debug logging buffer, config variables, and file keyword helpers for GDOC_ID/GDOC_LAST_PUSH/GDOC_LAST_PULL. Added ERT test verifying metadata get/set.
close_reason: Implemented Emacs package foundation (minor mode, debug log, metadata helpers)

title: Go tool: image handling (Task 3)
description: Implement Task 3 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: read images from paths, convert SVG→PNG, upload+insert into Google Doc during push.
notes: Added image handling: SVG→PNG conversion (oksvg+rasterx), upload PNG to Drive with public permission, insert via Docs InsertInlineImage + newline, and integrate into push pipeline. Added unit tests for SVG conversion.
close_reason: Implemented image handling (SVG→PNG conversion, Drive upload + public URL, Docs inline image insertion) integrated into push.

title: Emacs package: DWIM command + helpers (Task 9)
description: Implement Task 9 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: gh/org-docs-sync DWIM, helper commands, user workflow affordances.

title: Go tool: OAuth, S-expr IPC, config, debug (Task 1)
description: Implement Task 1 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: Go tool foundation (OAuth2, stdin/stdout S-expressions, XDG+TOML config, --debug logging).
notes: Scaffolded Go module + org2gdocs-api command (cmd/org2gdocs-api). Added config (XDG+TOML), debug logging, S-expression parser/writer with tests, auth flow skeleton (credentials+token paths). go test ./... passes.
close_reason: Completed implementation of Task 1 foundation (config/debug/sexp/auth scaffolding). OAuth flow requires credentials.json to validate end-to-end.

title: Go tool: pull operation (comment retrieval) (Task 4)
description: Implement Task 4 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: fetch comments/suggestions from Google Doc and map anchors back to org custom-ids.
notes: Implemented pull operation via Drive Comments API: decode pull request (doc-id, position-map, known ids, collaborator cache), fetch comments with required fields, map anchors to segment/custom IDs using position map + anchor JSON start/end indices, return structured comment list + new collaborators. Added unit tests for anchor parsing/mapping and pull request decoding.
close_reason: Implemented pull comment retrieval + mapping and S-expression response.

title: Go tool: push operation (full replacement) (Task 2)
description: Implement Task 2 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: push org-derived content into Google Docs via batchUpdate, full doc replacement, return position map.
notes: Implemented push operation plumbing: gdocs client (OAuth-based), content model, text formatting requests, full-replacement push builder (headings/paragraphs/lists/tables) with position-map output; cmd push handler decodes S-expr request and returns (result success ...). Unit tests cover request building and S-expr decoding.
close_reason: Implemented push handler + gdocs request builders for headings/paragraphs/lists/tables, with S-expr request/response and position-map. Requires credentials/doc to validate end-to-end.

title: Emacs package: content conversion + push (Task 7)
description: Implement Task 7 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: org-element→content S-expr conversion, CUSTOM_ID generation, babel execution gating, push workflow.

title: Integration testing + documentation (Task 10)
description: Implement Task 10 from org-gdocs-sync-plan.org: end-to-end tests against real Google Doc, plus README/WORKFLOW/CONTRIBUTING/TROUBLESHOOTING.
